title: Frequently when I join the que, the estimated time will say like 5-7 mins
body: I will wait the entire time and longer and not get one game to accept. It makes me feel like maybe im not really connecting to the que

replies.body:
Your queue times can vary depending on your MMR (matchmaking rating), since matchmaking ultimately wants to put you with others at your skill level and against others at close to or at that skill level. If you're at the extreme ends of the MMR spectrum, either high or low, it can take a while to pair you up with others. You may want to try testing what your queue times are like depending on what time of day you play, as there may be more players online at your skill level during specific times.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
